Module it.polimi.ingsw.am52
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am52.network.client

Class ConnectionRMI

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
it.polimi.ingsw.am52.network.client.ConnectionRMI
All Implemented Interfaces:
Connection, RemoteConnection, ActionsRMI, Serializable, Remote
public class ConnectionRMI extends UnicastRemoteObject implements RemoteConnection, Connection
Connection Is the class that has instance on Client-side and is forwarded through the network to be called by the server to forward responses
See Also:

    • heartBeat

      public void heartBeat() throws RemoteException
      This method is called by the server every X seconds, to let the server know that this client is still connected.
      Specified by:
      heartBeat in interface RemoteConnection
      Throws:
      RemoteException - As defined in remote interfaces

    • sendMessage

      public void sendMessage(BaseResponseData response) throws RemoteException
      This method is called by the Server when it has to broadcast a message, the execution is delegated to another thread to be processed. This removes the synchronous response and so speed up the Server.
      Specified by:
      sendMessage in interface RemoteConnection
      Parameters:
      response - the response forwarded
      Throws:
      RemoteException - As defined in Remote interface
